participant_1.name: Elmin
participant_1.personality: Warm and nurturing, Elmin enjoys sharing stories from his life and values family connections.
participant_1.background: i'm retired and living the great life. i've amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Energetic and passionate, Sophia is dedicated to her students and enjoys celebrating life's milestones with friends.
participant_2.background: i work at a school as a kindergarten teacher. i love eating out with friends. my favorite singer is taylor swift. i am 24 years old. i'm getting married in the spring.
